statements: SELECT customer_name, contact_number FROM customer_info
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2015
SELECT customer_name, vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM customer_info WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota'
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, year_of_manufacture FROM customer_info ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE customer_id = 3
SELECT * FROM customer_info WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, vehicle_make FROM customer_info WHERE vehicle_make LIKE '%Toyota%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_number FROM customer_info WHERE vehicle_model = 'Camry' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_number, year_of_manufacture FROM customer_info WHERE year_of_manufacture < 2005 ORDER BY year_of_manufacture;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM customer_info WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' OR customer_name LIKE '%Johnson%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT c.first_name, v.make, v.model FROM customers c JOIN vehicles v ON c.id = v.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Doe' OR phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT make, model, color FROM vehicles WHERE color IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, current_status FROM restoration_progress WHERE completion_percentage < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, contact_number, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '9063180a-586c-4821-b60a-0bb243c5259b';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, contact_number FROM customers WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT v.make, v.model, v.year, c.full_name FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN customers c ON v.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE v.color = 'Red';

SELECT r.current_status, r.completion_percentage, v.make, v.model, c.full_name FROM restoration_progress r INNER JOIN vehicles v ON r.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id INNER JOIN customers c ON v.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE r.completion_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY r.completion_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicles WHERE color='Red' AND year >= 2010 ORDER BY year ASC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, Vehicles.make, Orders.total_amount FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Vehicles ON Orders.vehicle_id = Vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE Orders.total_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, Orders.order_date, Payments.payment_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Payments ON Orders.order_id = Payments.order_id WHERE Payments.payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model FROM vehicles WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT o.order_id, p.part_name, op.quantity FROM orders o JOIN orders_parts op ON o.order_id = op.order_id JOIN parts p ON op.part_id = p.part_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC;
SELECT orders.order_id, customers.first_name, customers.last_name, orders.total_cost FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;

SELECT orders.order_date, vehicles.make, vehicles.model, parts.part_name, parts.part_cost FROM orders JOIN vehicles ON orders.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id JOIN orders_parts ON orders.order_id = orders_parts.order_id JOIN parts ON orders_parts.part_id = parts.part_id;
